Jo tere laagi preet mohe

Ki sang tere baadlon sa
Baadlon sa, baadlon sa udta rahun
Tere ek ishare pe teri ore mudta rahun

Aaadhi zamin, aadha aasmaan tha
Aadhi manzilein, aadha raasta tha
Ek tere aane se mukammal hua sab yeh
Bin tere jahaan bhi bewajah tha

Tera dil banke main sath tere dhdakun
Khud ko tujhse ab door na jaane doon

Ki sang tere paniyon sa
Paaniyon sa, paniyon sa behta rahun
Tu sunti rahe main kahaniyan sa kehta rahun

Ki sang tere baadlon sa

songs.name: MERE NAAM TU
songs.lyrics:
Woh rang bhi kya rang hai, jo milta na tere hoth ke rang se hubahu
Woh khushboo kya khushboo, thehre na jo teri saanwri zulf ke rubaru

Tere aage ye duniya hai pheeki si
Mere bin tu na hogi kisi ki bhi,
Ab ye zaahir sareaam hai, elaan hai

Jab tak jahaan mein subah shaam haim, tab tak mere naam tu
Jab tak jahaan mein mera naam hai, tab tak mere naam tu,

Uljhan bhi hoon teri, uljhan ka hal bhi hoon main,
Thoda sa ziddi hoon, thoda pagal bhi hoon main

Barkha bijli baadal jhoothay, jhoothi phoolon ki saugatein
Sachi tu hai sacha main hoon, sachi apne dil ki baatein,

Dastkhat haathon se haathon pe kar de tu,
Naa kar aankhon pe palkon ke parde tu,
Kya ye itna bada kaam hai, ailaan hai

Jab tak jahaan mein subah shaam hai, tab tak mere naam tu
Jab tak jahaan mein mera naam hai, tab tak mere naam tu

Mere hi ghere mein ghoomegi har pal tu aise,
Sooraj ke ghere mein rehti hai dharti ye jaise,
Paayegi tu khudko na mujhse judaa,
Tu hai mera aadha sa hissa sadaa

Tukde kar chaahe khaabon ke tu mere
Tootenge bhi tu rehne hain woh tere,
Tujhko bhi toh ye ilhaam hai, ailaan hai,

songs.name: Alvida
songs.lyrics:
Chupake Se Kahee Dhime Panv Se, Jane Kis Taraf Kis Ghadee
Aage Badh Gaye Hamase Raaho Me, Par Tum Toh Abhee The Yahee
Kuchh Bhee Naa Suna, Kab Kaa Tha Gila, Kaise Keh Diya Alvida
Jinake Darmiya Gujaree Thee Abhee, Kal Tak Yeh Meree Jindagee
Dono Baaho Ko Thandee Chanv Ko, Ham Bhee Kar Chale Alvida
Alvida Alvida Meree Raahe Alvida, Meree Sansein Kehati Hai Alvida
Alvida Alvida Abb Kehana Aur Kya, Jab Tune Keh Diya Alvida

Sunle Bekhabar, Yu Aankhe Pher Kar Aaj Tu Chalee Ja
Dhundegee Najar Hamako Hee Magar Har Jagah
Aisee Raato Me Leke Karvate, Yad Hame Karana
Aur Phir Har Kar Kehana Kyun Magar, Keh Diya Alvida Alvida
Koee Puchhe Toh Jara, Kya Socha Aur Kaha Alvida
Alvida Alvida Abb Kehana Aur Kya, Jab Tune Keh Diya Alvida

Ruthe Dil Chale, Phir Bhee Dil Kahe
Kash Mere Sang Aaj Hote Tum Agar, Hotee Har Dagar Gulsita
Tumase Hai Khafa, Ham Naraj Hai, Dil Hai Pareshan
Socha Naa Suna Tune Kyun Bhala Keh Diya Alvida Alvida
Koee Puchhe Toh Jara, Kya Socha Aur Kaha Alvida

Kyun Socha Aur Kahan Alvida

सारे लोग साला बोले मुझे वांटेड
दिल से महोब्बत थोड़ी ज़्यादा मुझे वांटेड
राधे राधे राधे राधे
राधे राधे राधे हो

कुडियां भी मुड़के दोबारा

डोंट टच मेरा करेंट हाई वोल्टेज
तुमसे महोब्बत थोड़ी ज़्यादा मुझे वांटेड
राधे राधे राधे राधे
राधे राधे राधे हो

राधे राधे राधे हो

कोई बने बैड तो मैं उसका भी डैड
मैं चीज़ क्या अब तक तू ये नहीं जानता

दिल में, मैं सबके बसा हूँ
जो हूँ दुआओं से बना हूँ
मेरे है तरीके मेरे अपने असूल है
सबको पता है बड़ा पक्का हूँ जुबां का

songs.name: Jay Jaykara
songs.lyrics:
Kya kabhi ambar se
Surya bichhadta hai
Kya kabhi bin baathi
Deepak jaltha hai

Kya kabi ambar se
Surya bichhadta hai
Kya kabhi bin baathi
Deepak jaltha hai

Kaissi hai ye anhoni
Har aank huyi nam
Chod gaya jo tu
Kaise jiyenge hum

Tuhi kinara, tuhi sahara
Tu jag sara, tuhi humara
Suraj tuhi taara

Jai jaikara, jai jaikara
Swami dena saath humaara
(jay jaykara, jay jaykara
Swami dena saath humaara)

Jahan jahan tere paaon pade
Wo dharti ambar ho jaye

Jaaney ye kaisi maya
Maya hai teri

Tu nirbal chaabal hai
Swami rakwala hum sab ka
Usko kya darr hai
Jispe chaya hai teri

Kan kan mein hai khush haali
Joomey hai daali daali
Hum pyason pe jo rim jim barsey
Hai baadal se
Tuhi woh amrit ki daara

Jai jaikara, jai jaikara
Swami dena saath humaara
(jay jaykara, jay jaykara
Swami dena saath humaara)

songs.name: Jiyo Re Bahubali Lyrics
songs.singer: Daler Mehndi, Sanjeev Chimmalgi, Ramya Behara
songs.lyrics:
Gali gali teri loh jali
Jiyo re baahubali

Gali gali teri loh jali
Jiyo re bahubali
Praano se badke humko hai
Tu pyaara
Sab gayenge, dohorayenge
Ab tera jai jai kara…

Aissa woh aisa, jaise parvath avichal sa
Aissa woh aisa, jaise parvath avichal sa
Aissa woh aisa, jaie parvath avichal sa
Aissa woh aisa, jaise parvath avichal sa

Haan kaisi karuna hai ye
Yeh kaisa naatha hai
Saans le ek toh dusra ji uthe
Ek hi dor mein hai jude…

Naina di andhi andhi chali hai
Ya koyi jwala jwala jali hai
Chaldey to dole dhara ye
Aissa wo bahubali hai
Kaal se bi woh na darey
Haathon pe hai sheesh liye
Maa jo kabi mangle to h
Mangle toh woh pal mein pran de

Aissa woh aisa, jaise parvath avichal sa
Aissa woh aisa, jaise parvath avichal sa
Aissa woh aisa, jag-mag hai tare sa
Jaisse parvath avichal sa
Jaisse parvath avichal sa

Aissa woh aisa, jaise parvath avichal sa (5 times)

Gali gali teri loh jali
Jiyo re bahubali
Praano se badke pyaara tu (2 times)

Sab gayenge, dohorayenge
Ab tera jai jai kara…

songs.name: Thodi Der
songs.lyrics:
Haann…
Haann..

Dil charkey ki ek too dhori
Dil charkey ki ek too dhori
Sufi iski rang
Haye…

Isme joh tera kawab piroya
Isme joh tera kawab piroya
Neende baani patang

Dil barta nahi aankhe raajti nahi
Dil barta nahi ankhey raajti nahi
Chaiye kitna bhi dekhti jaun
Wakt jaye mai rok na paun

Tu thori dar hor tehar ja sohneya
Tu thori dar hor tehar ja
Tu tori dair hor tehar ja zaalima
Tu tori dair hor tehar ja

Haann..
Haann..

Haye,
Dil terey bin ab jeena paaye
Dil terey bin ab jeena paaye
Sans milli ti raat

Ishq karengi tere hothon se
Ishq karengi tere hothon se
Bas ek teri baath

Teri doori naa sahun dur kuth se rahun
Teri duri naa sahun dur kud se rahun
Terey main hi reh jaoon
Tu hi samaj jaa jo mein chahoon

Tu thori dair hor tehar ja soneya
Tu tori dair hor tehar ja
Tu thori dair hor tehar ja zalima
Tu tori dar hor tehar ja

songs.name: Main Phir Bhi Tumko Chahunga
songs.lyrics:
Tum mere ho is pal mere ho
Kal shaayad ye aalam na rahey
Kuch aissa ho tum tum na raho
Kuch aissa ho hum hum na rahey
Ye raasthe alag ho jaye
Chaltey chaltey hum ko jaye

Main phir bhi tumko chahunga
Main phir bhi tumko chahunga
Main phir bhi tumko chaahunga
Main phir bhi tumko chaahunga

Iss chaahat mein mar jaunga
Main phir bi tumko chahunga
Meri jaan mein har kamoshi hai
Tera pyar ke nagme gaoonga
mmm…

Mai phir bi tumko chahunga
Mai phir bi tumko chahunga
Iz chahat mein mar jaunga
Main phir bi tumko chahunga

Aise zaruri ho mujko tum
Jaisey hawa hai sanson ko
Aisse talashun main tumko
Jaisse ke pair zameeno ko

Hasna ya rona ho muje
Pagal sa doondun main tumhe
Kal mujse mohabat ho na ho
Kal mujko ijazar ho na ho
Tootey dil ke tukdey lekar
Tere dar pe hi reh jaoonga
mmm…

Main phir bhi tumko chahunga
Main phir bhi tumko chahunga
Iz chahat mein mar jaunga
Main fir bhi tumko chahunga

Tum yun miley ho jab se muje
Aur suneri main lagthi hoon
Sirf labon se nahi ab toh
Poorey badan se hasthi hoon

Mere din raath saloney se
Sab hai tere hi hone se
Ye saath hamesha hoga nahi
Tum kahi main aur kahin

Lekin jab yad karoge tum
Main bankey hawa aa jaunga
oh…

Mai phir bhi tumko chahoonga
Mai phir bhi tumko chahoonga
Iss chahat mein marr jaoonga
Mai phir bhi tumko chahoonga

Main phir bhi tumko chahunga
Main phir bhi tumko chaahunga (2 times)

songs.name: Phir Bhi Tumko Chaahungi
songs.lyrics:
Baaho mein teri aakey lagaa
Mera safar toh yahi tak hai
Tumse shuru tumpey hi khatam
Meri kahani tumhi tak hai

Dil ko joh de rahat si
Tujme hai woh kamoshi
Sau baar talash liya kudko
Kuchh tere siva na mila mujko

Saanso se rishta tod bi loon
Tumse tod na paungi
hmm…

Main fir bhi tumko chahungi
Main fir bhi tumko chahungi
Is chahat mein mar jaoongi
Main phir bhi tumko chaahungi

Aankhen khuley toh main dekun tuje
Sirf ye hi farmaish hai
Pehli toh mujko yaad nahi
Tu meri aakiri kwahish hai

Se loon main ab teri kami
Mujse yeh hoga hi nahi

Tum aisse mujme shaamil ho
Tum jan meri tum hi dil ho
Shaayad main bula doon khud ko bi
Par tumko bhool na paoongi
Ho…

Main phir bhi tumko chaahungi
Main phir bhi tumko chaahungi
Iss chahat mein mar jaaungi
Main phir bhi tumko chahungi

songs.name: BAARISH (Half Girlfriend)
songs.lyrics:
Chehre mein tere
Khud ko main dhoondhun
Aankhon ke darmiyaan
Tu ab hai iss tarah
Khwabon ko bhi jagah na mile

Yeh mausam ki baarish
Yeh baarish ka paani
Yeh paani ki boondein
Tujhe hi toh dhoondhe
Yeh milne ki khwahish
Yeh khwahish puraani
Ho poori tujhi se
Meri yeh kahaani

Kabhi tujhme utrun
Toh saanson se guzrun
Toh aaye dil ko raahat

Main hoon bethikana
Panaah mujhko paana
Hai tujhme, de ijazat

Na koi darmiyaan
Hum dono hai yahan
Phir kyun hai tu bata
Faasley…

Yeh mausam ki baarish
Yeh baarish ka paani
Yeh paani ki boondein
Tujhe hi toh dhoondhe
Yeh milne ki khwahish
Yeh khwahish puraani
Ho poori tujhi se
Meri yeh kahaani

Na na… la la..

Hawaaon se tera pata poochta hoon
Ab toh aaja tu kahin se
Parindon ki tarah yeh dil hai safar mein
Tu mila de zindagi se

Bas itni ilteja
Tu aake ik dafa
Jo dil ne na kahaa
Jaan le…

Yeh mausam ki baarish
Yeh baarish ka paani
Yeh paani ki boondein
Tujhe hi toh dhoondhe
Yeh milne ki khwahish
Yeh khwahish purani
Ho poori tujhi se
Meri yeh kahaani

songs.name: Tu Hi Hai
songs.lyrics:
Kartha kyon nahi tu mujpe yakeen
Kyon mere dil ki tu suntha nahi

Hmmm…
Tere bagair kitna tanha sa hoon
Aalam ye dil ka tu samje kabi
Hai pata yeh tuje
Na jee sakoonga bin tere
Phir bhi kyun mujse judaa
Tu…

Tu hi hai
Tu hi toh hai
Mera junun
Tu hi hai
Tu hi toh hai
Dil ka sukun

Tu hai jiskey bina
Main ji na sakoon

Aa phir jiye shamein wahi
Chal phir wahi hum batein karey
Bechainiyon ke phir se siley hon
Phir dil mera yeh ahein barey
Zyada nahi toh thodi sahi
De de muje wohi zindagi

Aa mere nazdeek tu
Ye fasley mujko ghire
Hai patha yeh tuje
Na jee sakoonga bin tere
Phir bi kyon mujhse juda
Tu..

Tu hi hai
Tu hi to hai
Mera junoon
Tu hi hai
Tu hi toh hai
Dil ka sukun

Tu hai jiskey bina
Main jee na sakun

Qubul nigahon ki
Na ho wo dua
Jismey yaar ke
Pyar ki talab na ho
Har dua mein tu hi hai
Tu hi hai

Hai ye patha
Jaana hi hai raahon se teri door muje
Mumkin nahi hai mere liye
Par bulna hi hoga tuje

Ishk ke aage hai jo jahan
Ae dil le chal mujko wahan
Jo bachi mujme teri
Unn kushbuon se tu kar riha

Hai tuje ab mera
Haan alvida alvida
Phir bhi kyon dil kehta

Tu, tu hi hai
Tu hi toh hai
Mera junoon
Tu hi hai
Tu hi toh hai
Dil ka sukun

Tu hai jiskey bina
Main ji na sakun
Oh… dildara..

albums.name: Lut Gaye Hum Toh Pehli Mulaqaat Mein

songs.name: Lut Gaye Hum Toh Pehli Mulaqaat Mein
songs.singer: Jubin Nautiyal, Ustad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan
songs.lyrics:
Maine Jab Dekha Tha Tujhko
Raat Bhi Woh Yaad Hai Mujhko
Taare Ginte Ginte So Gaya

Dil Mera Dhadka Tha Kass Ke
Kuch Kaha Tha Tune Hass Ke
Main Usi Pal Tera Ho Gaya

Aasmano Pe Jo Khuda Hai
Usse Meri Yahi Dua Hai
Chand Yeh Har Roz Main Dekhu
Tere Sath Mein

Aankh Uthi Mohabbat Ne Angrai Li
Dil Ka Sauda Hua Chandani Raat Mein
Oh Teri Nazron Ne Kuch Aisa Jaadoo Kiya
Lut Gaye Hum Toh Pehli Mulaqaat Mein
Oh Aankh Uthi!

Paao Rakhna Na Zameen Par
Jaan Rukja Tu Ghadi Bhar
Thode Taare Toh Bichha Du
Main Tere Vaaste

Aajmale Mujhko Yaara
Tu Zara Sa Kar Ishaara
Dil Jala Ke Jagmaga Du
Main Tere Raaste

Haan Mere Jaisa Ishq Mein Pagal
Phir Mile Ya Na Mile Kal
Sochna Kya Hath Ye Dede
Mere Hath Mein

Aankh Uthi Mohabbat Ne Angrai Li
Dil Ka Sauda Hua Chandani Raat Mein
Oh Teri Nazron Ne Kuch Aisa Jaadoo Kiya
Lut Gaye Hum Toh Pehli Mulaqaat Mein
Oh Aankh Uthi!

Haan Kisse Mohabbat Ke
Hain Jo Kitabon Mein
Sab Chahta Hoon Main
Sang Tere Dohrana

Kitna Zaroori Hai
Ab Meri Khatir Tu
Mushqil Hai Mushqil Hai
Lafzon Mein Keh Pana

Ab Toh Yeh Alam Hai
Tu Jaan Mange Toh
Main Shaunk Se Dedu
Saugat Mein

Aankh Uthi Mohabbat Ne Angrai Li
Dil Ka Sauda Hua Chandani Raat Mein
Oh Teri Nazron Ne Kuch Aisa Jaadoo Kiya
Lut Gaye Hum Toh Pehli Mulaqaat Mein
Oh Aankh Uthi!

songs.name: Meri Aashiqui
songs.lyrics:
Tumhein kaise bataun ki papa ne meri shaadi kahin aur tai kar di hai
Kuchh hi dinon ke liye jaa rahi hoon
Baarish khatm hone se pehle waapas aa jaungi
Promise!

Baarishein aa gayi aur chali bhi gayi
Koyi dil mein siwa tere aaya nahi
Jab bhi sajda kiya naam tera liya
Bhool jaana tujhe humko aaya nahi

Dil to hai apang jaane kyun
Dhadka hi nahi hai kab se
Yeh dua hai meri rab se

Yeh dua hai meri rab se
Tujhe aashiqon mein sabse
Meri aashiqui pasand aaye
Meri aashiqui pasand aaye

Yeh dua hai meri rab se
Tujhe aashiqon mein sabse
Meri aashiqui pasand aaye
Meri aashiqui pasand aaye
Meri aashiqui pasand aaye

Tum hi ab kuchh kaho
Suljhaun kaise yeh mushkil
Haan tum hi ab kuchh kaho
Suljhaun kaise yeh mushkil
Jhooth bol ke hi
Rakh lo na tum mera yeh dil

Chaho to tod dena
Toota hi nahi yeh kab se

Yeh dua hai meri rab se
Tujhe aashiqon mein sabse
Meri aashiqui pasand aaye
Meri aashiqui pasand aaye
Meri aashiqui pasand aaye

Katra katra jee raha hoon
Lamha lamha mar raha hoon
Kaise khud ko main sambhalun tu bata
Tere bin hai soona soona
Mere dil ka kona kona
Tu kya jaane kaise itne din jiya

Kaise dil ko
Kaise dil ko main manaun
Naraaz pada hai kab se

Yeh dua hai meri rab se
Tujhe aashiqon mein sabse
Meri aashiqui pasand aaye
Meri aashiqui pasand aaye
Meri aashiqui pasand aaye
Meri aashiqui pasand aaye

songs.name: Do Ka Char
songs.lyrics:
Do ka chaar tere liye solah
Tu zarde ki hichki
Gulkand ka tola

Tu meetha paan
Main katha koriya
Dekha jo tujhko
Mera dil yeh bola

Tu raj dulaari
Main Shambhu Bhola
Tu mann mohini
Mera bairagi chola

Tu tezz chingari
Main charas ka jhola
Tu meethi Roohafza
Main baraf ka gola

Udti hai khushbu kimaami
Hota nasha zaafraani
Main betod dard ki kahani
Tu hi to hai mera malham yunani

Do ka chaar tere liye galla

songs.name: Uska Hi Bana
songs.lyrics:
Meri kismat ke har ek panne pe

 dil ki duniya ke sacche rishton mein
 zindagani ke sare hisso
 mein tu likh de mera usse

 ae khuda ae khuda

 ae khuda ae khuda

 uska hoon uss mein hoon uss se hoon

 main toh pyasa hoon hai dariya

 mujhe ghar de gali de shehar de
 usi ke naam ke
 kadam ye chale ya ruke ab usi ke vaaste
 dil mujhe de agar dard de uska par
 uski ho woh hasin gunje jo mera ghar

 ae khuda ae khuda
 jab bana uska hi bana
 ae khuda ae khuda
 jab bana uska hi bana

 mere hisse ki khushi ko hansi ko
 tu chaahe aadha kar
 chahe lele tu meri zindagi
 par ye mujhse vaada kar
 uske ashqon pe ghamon pe dukhon pe
 har uske zakhm par
 haq mera hi rahe har jagah har ghadi haan umr bhar
 ab faqat ho yahi wo rahe mujh mein hi
 wo juda kehne ko bichhde na par kabhi

 ae khuda ae khuda
 jab bana uska hi bana
 ae khuda ae khuda
 jab bana uska hi bana

 meri kismat ke har ek panne pe
 mere jeete ji baad marne ke
 mere har ik kal, har ik lamhe mein
 tu likh de mera usse
 ae khuda ae khuda ae khuda ae khuda

songs.name: Apna Time Aayega

songs.lyrics:

Ae mere dil sunn le zara [x2]


ऐ दिल ठहर जा
जीने की कोई तू वजह ढूंढ ले
गहरा न ग़म से

अपनी ख़ुशी का तू पता ढूंढ ले
तू प्यार कर इज़हार कर
है प्यार ही ग़म की दवा

(सुन्न  ले ज़रा सुन्न ले ज़रा
ऐ मेरे दिल  ज़रा)(२)

हूँ प्यार तेरा महसूस कर तू सीने
में तेरे उतरा हूँ मैं
छू के मुझे तू पहचान लेगा

आँखों मेरी तेरी यह रात है जो इस
रात है मुझ में सुबह

लिए ही ठहरा हूँ मैं

तेरा वह रातसा

(सुन्न  ले ज़रा सुन्न ले ज़रा
ऐ मेरे दिल  ज़रा)(२)

हाथों में तेरे रेखाओं सा मैं
लफ़्ज़ों में अपने बन ले मुझे
आवाज़ क्या मैं  बे सदा हूँ धड़कन में

अपनी सुन्न ले मुझे
मैं ज़िन्दगी हूँ जी ले मुझे तू
आसूं हूँ तेरा पी ले मुझे
मैं ख्वाब जैसा टूटा हूँ तुझ में

बिखरा हूँ तुझ में छुन ले मुझे
देख ले तुझ में हूँ मैं
तू ही मेरा है आइना

(सुन्न  ले ज़रा सुन्न ले ज़रा
ऐ मेरे दिल  ज़रा)(२)

songs.lyrics:
Dil se mita ke har faasla

Aye mere aanewale kal

दिल से मिटा के हर फासला

songs.name: Mere Sapno Ki Rani (Aradhana)
songs.lyrics:
Mere Sapno Ki Rani Kab Ayegi Tu
Aaye Rut Mastani Kab Ayegi Tu
Biti Jaye Zindagani Kab Ayegii Tu
Chali Aa, Aa Tu Chali Aa

Phool Si Khil Ke, Paas Aa Dil Ke
Door Se Mil Ke, Chain Naa Aaye
Aur Kab Tak Mujhe Tadapayegii Tu
Mere Sapno Ki Rani Kab Ayegi Tu

Pyar Kii Galiyan, Baagon Kii Kaliyan
Sab Rangaraliyaan, Poochh Rahiin Hain
Geet Panaghat Pe Kis Din Gaayegi Tuu
Mere Sapno Ki Rani Kab Ayegi Tu

Kya Hai Bharosaa, Aashiq Dil Kaa
Aur Kisi Pe, Ye Aa Jaaye
Aa Gayaa To Bahut Pachhatayegi Tu
Mere Sapno Ki Rani Kab Ayegi Tu
Aye Rut Mastanii Kab Aayegi Tu
Biti Jaaye Zindagani Kab Aayegi Tu
Chali Aa, Aa Tuu Chali Aa

songs.name: Samne Yeh Kaun Aaya (Jawani Diwani)
songs.lyrics:
Saamane ye kaun aayaa dil mein hui halachal
Dekh ke bas ek hi jhalak ho gaye ham paagal

Arre Baate mulaaqaate toh hongi ham se bhi
Arre hamse khulenge kabhi aaj nahi to kal

Rahanaa hai yahaan toh
Dono hai jawaan toh
Bhalaa dur kaise rahenge
Maanaa woh hasin hai
To ham bhi kam nahi hai
woh magarur kaise rahenge
Laa laa Laa………

Saamane ye kaun aayaa…….

Aankho hi aankho mein
Baato hi baato mein
Kabhi jaan pahachaan hogi
Sun lo ye kahaani
Hasinaa ik anajaani
Kisi din maharabaan hogi

Zu zu zu, zu zu zu

Saamane ye kaun aayaa

songs.name: Tum Saath Ho Jab Apne (Kaalia)
songs.lyrics:
Tum Sath Ho Jab Apne, Duniya Ko Dikha Dege
Hum Maut Ko Jine Ke, Andaz Sikha Dege

Mana Ke Andhero Ke, Gahare Hai Bahut Saye

Hum To Hai Dil Wale, Khanjar Se Nahi Marate

Tum Sath Ho Jab Apne, Duniya Ko Dikha Dege

Hai Ahal-e-jaha Tum Ko, Nafrat Ki Hai Bimari

Bhadakaya Karo Shole, Phenka Karo Chigari

Tum Sath Ho Jab Apne, Duniya Ko Dikha Dege
Hum Maut Ko Jine Ke, Andaz Sikha Dege

songs.name: Yeh Ladka Hai Allah Kaisa Hai Kaisa Hai Diwana (Hum Kisi Se Kum Naheen)
songs.singer: Asha Bhosle, Kishore Kumar, Mohammed Rafi, R D Burman
songs.lyrics:
Yeh Ladka Hai Allah Kaisa Hai Divana
Kitna Mushkil Hai Tauba Isko Samjhana
Ke Dhire-dhire Dil Bekarar Hota Hai
Hote Hote Hote, Pyar Hota Hai
Ho Yeh Ladka Hai Allah Kaisa Hai Divana

Hamne Toh Itna Dekha, Hamne Toh Itna Sikha
Dil Kaa Sauda Hota Hai, Sauda Jindagee Kaa
Hamne Toh Itna Dekha, Hamne Toh Itna Sikha
Dil Kaa Sauda Hota Hai, Sauda Jindagee Kaa
Milte Hee Kaise Koyee Hota Hai Divana
Kitna Mushkil Hai Tauba Isko Samjhana
Ke Dhire Dhire Dil Bekarar Hota Hai
Hote Hote Hote, Pyar Hota Hai
Ho Yeh Ladka Hai Allah Kaisa Hai Divana

Ho Sakta Hai Dekho Naa, Samjho Mittee Ko Sona
Pal Bhar Kaa Hasna Ho Jaye Jivan Bhar Kaa Rona
Ho Sakta Hai Dekho Naa, Samjho Mittee Ko Sona
Pal Bhar Kaa Hasna Ho Jaye Jivan Bhar Kaa Rona
Dekho Jaldee Me Kabhee Dil Ko Naa Lagana
Kitna Mushkil Hai Tauba Isko Samjhana
Ke Dhire Dhire Dil Bekarar Hota Hai
Hote Hote Hote, Pyar Hota Hai
Oh Yeh Ladka Hai Allah Kaisa Hai Divana

Bholee Ho Tum Kya Jano, Ab Bhi Mujhko Pehchano
Sapna Tumhara Mai Hu, Mano Ya Naa Mano

Sapna Tumhara Mai Hu, Mano Ya Naa Mano
Dekho Nadanee Se Mujhe Naa Thukrana
Nahee Toh Gatee Hir Hogee Yeh Tarana
Ke Dhire Dhire Dil Bekarar Hota Hai
Hote Hote Hote, Pyar Hota Hai

Song Lyrics in Hindi Text

आशा:
(ये लड़का हाय अल्लाह कैसा है दीवाना
कितना मुश्क़िल है तौबा इसको समझाना
के धीरे-धीरे दिल बेक़रार होता है
के होते होते होते, प्यार होता है) -२

ये लड़का हाय अल्लाह …

(हमने तो इतना देखा, हमने तो इतना सीखा
दिल का सौदा होता है सौदा ज़िंदगी का) -२
मिलते ही कैसे कोई होता है दीवाना
कितना मुश्क़िल है तौबा इसको समझाना
के धीरे-धीरे दिल बेक़रार होता है
के होते होते होते, प्यार होता है

(हो सकता है देखो न, समझो मिट्टी को सोना
पल भर का हँसना हो जाए जीवन भर का रोना) -२
देखो जळी में कभी दिलको न लगाना
कितना मुश्क़िल है तौबा इसको समझाना
के धीरे-धीरे दिल बेक़रार होता है

songs.name: Film Out
songs.lyrics:
You, in my imagination
Are so vivid
As if you are right there
But I reach out my hand
And you suddenly disappear

From all the memories stored in my heart
I gather up the ones of you, link them together
Gazing at them projected across the room
I feel you with every burst of pain

La-la-la, la-la-la
La-la-la, la-la-la
Oh-oh

La-la-la, la-la-la

Two glasses placed side by side, their role
Never fulfilled, ah, just as they were
Since you last touched them

From all the memories stored in my heart
I gather up the ones of you, link them together
Gazing at them projected across the room
I feel you with every burst of pain

Don't have to be right
Just wanted you to stay the way you are
Kind hearted, always smiling, but
If tears can be measured, it took this long but
I've barely made it by your side
And found you

From all the memories stored in my heart
I gather up the ones of you, link them together
Gazing at them projected across the room
I fall asleep with you vivid in my arms

The words you whisper, the resonance
Wander aimlessly around the room
The fragrance I smell, the warmth I feel
As long as it lasts, as long as it lasts

You, in my imagination
Are so vivid
As if you are right there
But I reach out my hand
And you suddenly disappear

(Ah, yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah)

songs.name: Spring Day (봄날)
songs.lyrics:
I miss you
When I say that
I miss you more
I'm looking at your photo
But I still miss you
Time is so cruel
I hate us
Now it's hard
To even see each other's faces

It's only winter here
Even in August, winter is here
My heart makes time run
Like a Snowpiercer left alone
I wanna hold your hand
And go to the other side of the earth
To end this winter
How much longing
Has to fall like snow
For the spring days to come?
Friend

Like a small piece
Of dust
That floats in the air
If the flying snow is me
I could
Reach you faster

Snowflakes are falling
Getting farther away
I miss you (I miss you)
I miss you (I miss you)
How much more do I have to wait?
How many more nights do I have to stay up?
Until I can see you? (until I can see you?)
Until I can meet you? (until I can meet you?)

Past the end of this cold winter
Until the spring comes again
Until the flowers bloom again
Stay there a little longer
Stay there

Did you change?
(Did you change?)
Or did I change?
(Or did I change?)
I hate even this moment that is passing
I guess we changed
I guess that's how everything is

Yeah I hate you
Although you left
There hasn't been a day
That I have forgotten you
Honestly, I miss you
But now I'll erase you
Because that will hurt less
Than resenting you

I'm blowing out the cold you
Like smoke, like white smoke
I say that I'm gonna erase you
But actually, I still can't let you go

Snowflakes are falling
Getting farther away
I miss you (I miss you)
I miss you (I miss you)
How much more do I have to wait?
How many more nights do I have to stay up?
Until I can see you? (until I can see you?)
Until I can meet you? (until I can meet you?)

You know it all
You're my best friend
The morning will come again
Because no darkness, no season
Can last forever

Cherry blossoms are blooming
The winter is ending
I miss you (I miss you)
I miss you (I miss you)
If I wait a little longer
If I stay up a few more nights
I'll go see you (I'll go see you)
I'll go pick you up (I'll go pick you up)

Past the end of this cold winter
Until the spring comes again
Until the flowers bloom again
Stay there a little longer
Stay there

songs.name: I Like You So Much, You'll Know It
songs.lyrics:
I like your eyes, you look away when you pretend not to care
I like the dimples on the corners of the smile that you wear
I like you more, the world may know but don't be scared
'Cause I'm falling deeper, baby be prepared

I like your shirt, I like your fingers, love the way that you smell
To be your favorite jacket, just so I could always be near
I loved you for so long, sometimes it's hard to bear
But after all this time, I hope you wait and see

Love you every minute, every second
Love you everywhere and any moment
Always and forever I know I can't quit you
'Cause baby you're the one, I don't know how
I love you 'til the last of snow disappears
Love you 'til a rainy day becomes clear
Never knew a love like this, now I can't let go
I'm in love with you, and now you know

I like the way you try so hard when you play ball with your friends
I like the way you hit the notes, in every song you're shining
I love the little things, like when you're unaware
I catch you steal a glance and smile so perfectly

Though sometimes when life brings me down
You're the cure my love
In a bad rainy day
You take all the worries away

Love you every minute, every second
Love you everywhere and any moment
Always and forever I know I can't quit you
'Cause baby you're the one, I don't know how
In a world devoid of life, you bring color
In your eyes I see the light, my future
Always and forever I know, I can't let you go
I'm in love with you, and now you know
I'm in love with you, and now you know

Ho.. resham ke dhaage
Pedon pe baandhe
Maine kahaan the kabhi

Jud hi gaye phir bhi

Main teri nazar utaaru
Tujhe jag se sambhaalu
Koi aanch tujhpe aaye na..

Kisi aur se na kiya.. kiya...

Mede thi kain laavjo mari haathu vaalida

Ke vehlera tame aavjo...

songs.name: Ultimate Bollywood Mashup
songs.lyrics:
Tum hi ho
Ab tum hi ho
Zindagi ab tum hi ho,

Mera kya hoga
Socho na zara
Suraj dooba hai yaaro
Raste bhula do saare
Mera kya hoga
Socho to yaara,

Gham tum bhula do saare sansar ke,
Khuda jaane ke main fida hoon
Ik zara intezaar
Khuda jaane main mit gaya
Tujhe dekha to ye jaana sanama.

Chaiya chaiya chaiya
Chal chaiya chaiya chaiya chaiya (x2),
Ke main hoon tera (x2).

Har pal teriyan yaadan Yaadan
vich ae tu
Kajra re kajra re
Mere kaare kaare naina.

Shaam wahi kaam wahi tere bina O sanam
Dheere dheere se
Neend nahi chain nahi
Mere kaare kaare naina.

Khuda jaane ke main fida hoon
Ik zara intezaar
Khudaa jaane main mit gaya
Tujhe dekha to ye jaana sanam.

Chaiya chaiya chaiya
Chal chaiya chaiya chaiya chaiya (x2),
Ke main hoon tera (x2).

Main hoon yahan
Tu hai yahan
Meri bahon mein aa
Aa bhi ja haan,

O jaane jaan
(Chaiya chaiya chaiya chaiya
Chal chaiya chaiya chaiya chaiya),
Meri baahon mein aa bhool ja haan.
